description:
Kawaki starts to believe that being a genin is not for him. The Seventh Hokage gives him a last shot and assigns him to join Shikadai and Cho-Cho on a mission to protect Mozuku, from the Land of Calm Seas, and escort him back to his homeland. Will Kawaki be able to cooperate with his comrades and fulfill the mission this time? 
Meanwhile, Team 7 is on another mission and they pass a group who seem to be ninja in disguise…
Source: crunchyroll
